summary: Ever wanted to have a cozy little home that is not lacking functionality or aesthetics? Look no further than to Kthardamzel!
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][size=6][b][u]Kthardamzel [/u][/b][/size][/font][/center][center][size=3]A Dwemer player home with a twist[/size][/center]



[i]Between the Rift and the Eastmarch, an old dwarven craftsman built his own personal, secluded refuge to study the various aspects craftsmanship. Endless research of the arcane, alchemy and smithing led to his hermit life and his untimely end...



[/i][size=2]This is the first mod i publish so please be gentle and give constructive critique wherever you can. Also I suck at english so this ain't no place for grammar nazis. [/size]


[size=3]Do you ever wanted a home that's not only beautiful to look at but actually practical?[/size]
[size=3]Do you just hate it to carry around all your crafting stuff just to make or improve your gear?[/size]
[size=3]Don't want to clutter your inventory with alchemy ingredients just to make your potions?[/size]
[size=3]Do you like your gear organized?[/size]

[size=3]If you answered "yes" to any of these questions I welcome you to Kthardamzel.[/size]
[size=3]Kthardamzel is a cozy, little dwemer home in between two waterfalls overviewing the volcanic area of the Eastmarch.[/size]
[size=3]It features:[/size]

[list]
[*][size=3]Automatic storing and crafting system[/size]
[*][size=3]Practical living space[/size]
[*][size=3]Fletched out rooms with handplaced and fitting clutter in every corner[/size]
[*][size=3]Epic outside balcony[/size]
[*][size=3]No animal encounters in the outside-area (dragons not guaranteed)[/size]
[/list]

[size=4][u]Autosorting System[/u]
[/size][i]Don't bother with the weight of your gear anymore![/i]
[size=3]
Features:[/size][list]
[*][size=3]Designated and named storing and sorting chests for: armor, weapons, shields, clothing, valuables, ores, ingots, leather misc, keys, soul gems, scrolls, food, books and alchemy ingredients[/size]
[*][size=3]One master sorting chest that automatically sorts your items to their appropriate chests[/size]
[*][size=3]Also some chests that are uneffected by the autosorting-system[/size]
[*][size=3]Crafting without having the items in your inventory: Place them in either their named container or in the sorting chest and access them from every crafting station in the house.[/size]
[/list] (If something is greyed out in your crafting menu, eventhough you have the materials and the perks, that's a bug. Just craft something and everythingshould be listed appropriatly)[center]Check the screenshots for details on the containers


[size=4]Requirements:[/size]
[size=3]Dawnguard[/size]
[size=3]Hearthfires[/size]
[size=3]Dragonborn[/size]
[size=3]SKSE[/size][/center]


Suggestions, bugreports or everything else is welcome. Feel free to message me

Credits:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7913946/?]Loli[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3231858/?]Elianora[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2235573/?]Oaristys[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/258945/?]InsanitySorrow[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2250922/?]Blary[/url] for all the awesome resources
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3924910/?]Sjogga[/url] for the autosorting scripts
My girlfriend for patience
My cats for only restarting my PC twice during the making
author: RantanplanSkA
